divs: Sighting Detailsblue haze of an object that looked like it was made a 3 d object with objects lines that crossed into itself these appeard like fog lines or almost like ice it went out of eye veiw in a few seconds i didnt see any burnings of meteor tails in fact it looks very similiar to something i saw in 1990s a compact image being stationary also early in the morning t but this one was trying to angle its reflective hull to the sunshine i watched this for a few minutes as it was trying to change ithe refelcetive body being caused by the sun arching on its hull this was in poole , dorset - im sure theres some thing that our goverments like to keep secrat about objects either they see otr monitor i wish i could of drew it for u if you can imagine a blue object with its hull definined in these foggy lines and the rest on the ship almost hidden a flying diamond pretzil would be the best discription moveing so fast in a line could be an ice meteor maybe ? was there any monitored for this day on that trajectory going across the sky in the direction mentioned earlyer ? i was only out cause my dog felt ill thats the only reason i saw this object
